item.title: Et la machine dev√Ænt artiste

item.title: La musique des souvenirs

[‚Ä¶] Mais, quand d‚Äôun pass√© ancien rien ne subsiste, apr√®s la mort des √™tres, apr√®s la destruction des choses, seules, plus fr√™les mais plus vivaces, plus immat√©rielles, plus persistantes, plus fid√®les, l‚Äôodeur et la saveur restent encore longtemps, comme des √¢mes, √† se rappeler, √† attendre, √† esp√©rer, sur la ruine de tout le reste, √† porter sans fl√©chir, sur leur gouttelette presque impalpable, l‚Äô√©difice immense du souvenir.

item.title: Type the Untypable
item.description: You use Typescript. You want to type the world. But you don‚Äôt want to read the whole Typescript doc. So here I come with this introduction to Typescript advanced typings with all type tricks you need.

item.title: I've never understood Redux, so I rewrote it.
item.description: I‚Äôve been using Redux for a few years. It‚Äôs cool! I can manage the state of my application in a single Store with many reducers. But‚Ä¶ wait, what is really a store? A reducer?
